A: The laser procedure costs from about $800 on Long Island to upward of $1500 in Manhattan. Call now and be one of many to get rid of this disease with this great toenail fungus treatment, pain free!

The cost of nail fungus laser procedure is $250 per treatment. We will do 3 laser procedures. Although we have found that while some people in Minnesota respond to just one to two treatments, nails grow so slowly (up to a year) that we couldn’t tell which patient will get better response within a few months.

“ $299 Exclusive Limited Time Offer – Up to 3 Treatments If Required “. $299 Toenail Fungus – Laser Treatment (Both Feet a $1,200 Value). The PinPointe FootLaser ™ is the first clinically proven laser device for the increase of clear nails in patients with onychomycosis, or nail fungus.

About the Treatment. Laser treatment for toenail fungus can be performed at any laser clinic. The treatment includes targeting a laser beam on the fungal infection, so as to destroy it completely. A hand-held laser device is used for this purpose, so that the technician can adjust the beam in a better manner.

1 They had received this clearance back in 2010. 2  The average treatment for this particular laser will last upwards of 30 minutes and can cost upwards of $750 to $1,500. 3  Early studies have indicated that patients have had a success rate of more than 80 percent.

If you decide laser treatment is right for you, the charge is $400 for up to five nails and $600 when all 10 are done. This fee includes TWO laser treatments six weeks apart. While the second Laser Treatment is included in this cost, not included, is a regular office visit fee of $45.
